channel.title: Streets &Amp; Highways on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Streets &Amp; Highways on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Free Ride for EVs in the Carpool Lane Is Coming to an End
item.description: The US government is ending a program that allowed EVs and hybrids to display a “Clean Air Vehicle” sticker and use the HOV lane on freeways, even if the driver was alone in the car.
